entry.title: Kevin van Veen bares all in revealing interview - how to stop Celtic, Kyogo, 30 goals and leaving Motherwell
entry.summary: Kevin van Veen is one of Scotland’s most colourful characters, as well as being a pretty adept striker. His goal for Motherwell that earned them a 1-1 draw at Celtic Park was his 24th of the season and helped his team become the first to take points from Parkhead this season. And in his usual honest manner, the Dutchman explained exactly how you do it.

entry.title: Welcome to Hampden, let me show you to your seat - actually just take the whole row
entry.summary: I haven’t always been a sports reporter. Pipe down, all those hollering: “We didnae ken you ever were!” My first match viewed from the pressbox, though, was a 12.15pm semi-final for Inverness Caley Thistle just about the length of the country from the Highlands, so all those fans trekking to Hampden on Saturday for such an ungodly kick-off, I feel your pain.
